sprint_goal: Establish core security, authentication, and compliance auditing foundation
key_deliverables: Azure B2C Auth; Audit Service; Mobile Signature Capture
demo_objectives: Login flow; Audit log creation; Signature drawing
success_criteria: Secure login operational; Audit logs indexed; Signature captured on device
mitigation_strategies: Use standard user flows for MVP

sprint_goal: Implement core service logic including geospatial routing and admin service area definition
key_deliverables: Service Area Drawing UI; GeoJSON Storage; Routing Engine; Signature Upload
demo_objectives: Draw polygon on map; Auto-route request to center; View signature link
success_criteria: Routing logic accurately matches point to polygon; Signature stored in Blob

sprint_goal: Deliver advanced data features: OCR for consumers and Analytics for brands
key_deliverables: Mobile OCR; Analytics Dashboard; PDF Export
demo_objectives: Scan invoice on mobile; View brand analytics charts; Export PDF
success_criteria: OCR extracts data accurately; Analytics queries perform under 1s
risk_factors: OCR accuracy variance; Read replica latency
mitigation_strategies: Fallback to manual entry for OCR; Caching for analytics

sprint_goal: Implement complex real-time location tracking for technicians
key_deliverables: WebSocket Gateway; Redis Buffer; Mobile BG Location; Consumer Map View
demo_objectives: Track moving technician in real-time on consumer app
success_criteria: Latency < 2s; Background tracking works on lock screen
